subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3259, how did it go?
description_text:
No he recibido los artículos

El vie, 28 nov 2025 14:14, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:

> Hello Luis, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi luis santana,    We apologize for the inconvenience. I see the shipment is currently undergoing customs clearance. Please contact UPS to expedite the process.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1Z30AV566798022663/trackdetails
